meanings.sent1: She always outadds her classmates in math competitions.
meanings.sent2: The new calculator outadds the old one in speed and accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The little girl outadds her friends in counting candies.
meanings.sent4: His passion for numbers outadds everyone else's in the office.
meanings.sent5: The chef's secret ingredient outadds all others in flavor.

meanings.definition: To exceed in the act of adding.
meanings.sent1: The generous donor outadds all others in contributing to charity.
meanings.sent2: The student outadds the teacher in solving complex equations.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel outadds its friends in gathering nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness outadds any material gift one could receive.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's determination outadds any physical limitation.

meanings.definition: To outdo in the action of adding.
meanings.sent1: The magician outadds his peers in creating illusions.
meanings.sent2: The artist outadds expectations with each new masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The child outadds the adults in building the tallest block tower.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity outadds any constraints placed upon her.
meanings.sent5: The inventor's innovation outadds all previous designs.
